channel.title: Ally list
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Ally list" - Keeping the ally list up to date with newer allies

item.title: Re: Ally list
item.content:encoded:
I think our listing is up to date with that forum post. All we were missing was some info on LisaLisa and Bruce Jr. Lvl. 2 from what I could see. We do still need to fill in a few more pages for the allies themselves, and get them listed on the mission page.

We're actually ahead of that listing by a little bit, since we've got Smokey the Bear Lvl. 2 and they don't.

item.title: Ally list
item.content:encoded: The ally list is a bit out of date, as McMaster has added a few new allies, and some more lvl 2's. Here is a forum post with some of the newer ones. I've also posted it in the comment on the allies page. I'll add a few right now, but I need to focus on other stuff, so if someone can go though and make sure the list is up to date.
